title: Lesson 86
paragraph: Development and ingredients require careful planning and execution. Consistent application, proper routing, and understanding components ensure quality outcomes.

words.meaning: to grow, advance, or create over time
words.example: The company plans to develop new software.

words.meaning: a component or element of a mixture
words.example: Flour is a key ingredient in bread.

words.meaning: a way or course taken to reach a destination
words.example: They chose the fastest route to the city.

words.meaning: a ray or line of light; a structural support
words.example: The sunlight beamed through the window.
The message is implyable from the context.
This is a typical example of her work.
The method is consistentable across experiments.

words.meaning: able to be linked or joined
words.example: These cables are connectable to each other.

words.meaning: accepting or allowing what happens without resistance
words.example: He remained passive during the argument.

words.meaning: the act of making certain or guaranteeing
words.example: Regular checks ensure thement of quality.
